stories.text:
I'm working on a new app and it will require some short video clips; I'm semi-set on using Vimeo over YouTube/other options and wondering if others have run into any issues, or if this is generally not a good idea. The app itself is more/less a 'workout app' though highly specialized, and will only need to show very short video clips around 10-20 seconds in most cases. Long-term I could see offering students the ability to record/upload their own videos for feedback from staff members, etc.

From what I'm seeing the Vimeo api looks like a really easy, clean and inexpensive option.

Thank you
